response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe its true value exceeds $1,200,000. Considering the significant benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $950,000. This opportunity allows you to secure this remarkable asset at a substantial discount, making it an attractive proposition for both immediate use and future appreciation. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am here to assist you in making an informed decision.", "product_price": 950000}
